artist: Natori Shunsen; Published by Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: head and shoulders of man holding up a sword with a blue handle; white kimono with green, yellow and brown organic design
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica and embossing
text: Twenty-ninth design of a set of 36. Imagined portrait of the actor Bandō Hikosaburō  VI (1886-1938) as Matsuōmaru in the scene Kurumabiki (Tearing the Carriage Apart) of the kabuki drama Sugawara denju tenarai kagami 菅原伝授手習鑑 (Mirror of Learning and Transmitting Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy).
title: The Actor Bandō Hikosaburō  VI as Matsuōmaru
